trans-unit.source: A trigger action that changes the speed of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En utløser handling som endres av hastigheten på en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use a SetStoryboardSpeedRatio action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to interactively control a storyboard's speed ratio.
trans-unit.target: Bruk en SetStoryboardSpeedRatio handling med en <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>eller <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>til å kontrollere interaktivt forholdet mellom hurtigbuffertreff for en dreiebok raskere.</xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> property of SetStoryboardSpeedRatio to specify a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A>for SetStoryboardSpeedRatio til å angi en ny <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>animasjonen hastigheten som et forhold mellom gamle animasjonshastigheten.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A> to 2, you double the speed of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animations and if you set a value of 0.5, you reduce the speed by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har angitt for eksempel den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A>til 2, doble hastigheten på den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>animasjoner og hvis du har angitt en verdi på 0,5, du redusere hastigheten med 50 prosent.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio.SpeedRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: This object affects the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> at anytime after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> begins.
trans-unit.target: Innvirkning på dette objektet i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>på når som helst etter den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>starter.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you pause the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> and use the SetStoryboardSpeedRatio, when you resume the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, it uses the new speed ratio.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du stopper for eksempel den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>og bruke SetStoryboardSpeedRatio, når du fortsetter i <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, bruker den nye raskere forholdet mellom hurtigbuffertreff.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: Rather, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>, which controls the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: I stedet <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>må referere til den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>som kontrollerer <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pause, Fortsett, Stopp eller ellers kontrollen en dreieboken interaktivt til kunne stanse midlertidig, gjenoppta eller ellers kontrollere en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>interaktivt angitt av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>og bruke en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>objektet (eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) til å kontrollere ved å referere til den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>er ikke angitt, den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>kan ikke kontrolleres interaktivt når den er startet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Se [slik: Bruk hendelsesutløsere til å kontrollere en dreieboken etter den starter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SetStoryboardSpeedRatio"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en ny <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> animasjonen hastigheten som et forhold mellom gamle animasjonshastigheten.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animation speed as a ratio of the old animation speed.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å angi en ny <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>animasjonen hastigheten som et forhold mellom gamle animasjonshastigheten.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the SpeedRatio to 2, you double the speed of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> animations and if you set a value of 0.5, you reduce the speed by 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du setter SpeedRatio til 2, du doble hastigheten på den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>animasjoner og hvis du har angitt en verdi på 0,5, du redusere hastigheten med 50 prosent.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>
Hastigheten forholdet mellom hurtigbuffertreff for den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>.
